articles.author: Mike Potter
articles.title: 'Not enough votes' | Indiana Senate will not meet to vote on redistricting - WTHR
articles.description: Indiana State Senate President Rod Bray says there are not enough votes in the Senate and so they will not meet in December.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS The Indiana Senate will not meet to vote on redistricting this year.
Senate President Rod Bray issued a statement saying there are not enough votes, and the planned meeting for December… [+5035 chars]
